channel.title: "We've Got Hostiles!" Ideas.
channel.description:
Got any ideas or thoughts on "We've Got Hostiles!" Post 'em here! These are some some of my thoughts.
1.at the beginning when you exit the elavator, you see a scientist banging on the Security station window, yelling about the silo door. Here, you could ru up to him and quickly tap use a few times and get him to follow you ruining the scripted sequence, and he could open the security door, you could kill him under the door, push the button, and skip the whole chapter. This shoyuldn't be a possibility in the game and should be left out, as this makes no sense as he can open the door, open the silo door, and continue.
2.At the same time above, the gaurd in the security station gets attacked by a headcrab zombie. i think he should put up a slighty better fight( Like he pulls the zombie out a litle bit or mostly, then he gets pulled in.) The zombie should later appear outside, or in that vent in the end of the chapter, as the zombie along with the corpse or gone/missing.
3.The scientist in the security station should be either outside of the room or not there at all, as he isn't in there at the start of the chapter, yet somehow, with no weapon whatsoever, makes it passed all the zombies, vorts, HECU, and others to get in that room.He/She should be either pasing by the station or something similar.

item.description:

item.title: "We've Got Hostiles!" Ideas.
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
GordonReturns:

I got TFC with the HL game of the year edition. Kept waiting for TF2 to be released, but it never did and then it randomly popped back up as a cartoony version after like forever.

Yeah I thought the cartoony look wasn’t too good at first. but then i started to play it and its fun now.

Read full topic

item.title: "We've Got Hostiles!" Ideas.
item.dc:creator: GordonReturns
item.description:
raw_bean:

TFC came with Half-Life anthologies/packs/retail boxes long before TF2 was released. Indeed, before HL2 was released.

I got TFC with the HL game of the year edition. Kept waiting for TF2 to be released, but it never did and then it randomly popped back up as a cartoony version after like forever.

Read full topic

item.title: "We've Got Hostiles!" Ideas.
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Crypt19:

What offer? I was Looking around on steam for something productive and i didn’t see anything.

It was right there in a big panel on the front page of the Steam store for the whole weekend, viewed either over the web or in the Steam client. There was also a news post about it, a Steam News Update pop-up, and an advert in the store’s switching banner thingy at the top, I believe. Not sure how you can have missed it, tbh, unless you were going online with your eyes shut.

Read full topic

item.title: "We've Got Hostiles!" Ideas.
item.dc:creator: GordonReturns
item.description:
DansonDelta40:

Ever travelled by airplane? It’s the stewardesses who welcome you to the city you have just arrived at, even before you get off the plane. Same logic.

The stewardess has a better chance of being hot.

Ontopic: Definitely wanting the guard-zombie fight a little better, but do remember that it(The zombie) did pop up behind him and grab him around the neck or torso or w/e. The surprising thing is that he got his pistol out and fired a few time before gibbing.

Read full topic
